ygData.subject: RE: Various..
ygData.msgSnippet: should I still get all the pieces myself and just wait till 50 to turn them in?  Do you really have that many mobs to kill at level 49/50 that
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
should I still get all the pieces myself and just wait till 50 to turn
them in?
<snip>


Do you really have that many mobs to kill at level 49/50 that getting the
items and holding them would be that big of a pain? If the expansion and
Level increase had already happened, then I would say wait. But since you
can only kill the lame level 49/50 MoBs with 60 other level 50 characters
next to you (extreme sarcasm), get the stuff and hold onto it. After all you
don't have long to go, so why wait?


former TSK
Cronik
